title: Bonus: Meg Wolitzer Talks to Elizabeth Strout
description: In this bonus conversation, host Meg Wolitzer talks to friend and Pulitzer Prize-winning author Elizabeth Strout about writing, short stories, and the use of recurring characters in her work.
author: mary.shimkin@symphonyspace.org (Symphony Space)
content:encoded: In this bonus conversation, host Meg Wolitzer talks to friend and Pulitzer Prize-winning author Elizabeth Strout about writing, short stories, and the use of recurring characters in her work.
